Back/
├── app/
│   ├── main.py                 # FastAPI app entry
│   ├── models/
│   │   ├── database.py         # PostgreSQL models
│   │   ├── user.py             # User models
│   │   ├── course.py           # Course models
│   │   └── evaluation.py       # Evaluation models
│   ├── routers/
│   │   ├── auth.py             # Authentication endpoints
│   │   ├── dashboard.py        # Dashboard data endpoints
│   │   ├── courses.py          # Course management
│   │   ├── evaluations.py      # Evaluation endpoints
│   │   └── analytics.py        # Sentiment & anomaly endpoints
│   ├── services/
│   │   ├── svm_sentiment.py    # SVM implementation
│   │   ├── dbscan_anomaly.py   # DBSCAN implementation
│   │   ├── firebase_service.py # Firebase integration
│   │   └── auth_service.py     # Authentication logic
│   ├── utils/
│   │   ├── preprocessing.py    # Text preprocessing (spaCy)
│   │   ├── database.py         # DB connection
│   │   └── security.py         # Security utilities
│   └── config.py               # Configuration settings
├── requirements.txt
└── .env                        # Environment variables
